H0.text: Drinking alcohol is the activity that is a good health habit.

H1.text: Exercising regularly is a good health habit.

H2.text: Sleeping only 5 hours daily is a good health habit.

H3.text: Smoking cigarettes is an activity that is a good health habit.

A4.text: Some studies indicate that exercise may increase life expectancy and the overall quality of life.

A5.text: People who participate in moderate to high levels of physical exercise have a lower mortality rate compared to individuals who by comparison are not physically active.
